title: Apple boosting supply chain capacity for MacBook Pro miniLED panels
content:
A report from early this week showed that Apple in the last quarter of 2021 sold more MacBook Pros with miniLED displays than all high-end OLED notebook manufacturers combined. That said, Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo believes the company will push harder with this new MacBook.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple boosting supply chain capacity for MacBook Pro miniLED panels appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo believes the company wants to expand miniLED panels production for the new MacBook Pro.
